entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain mixed with snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with a few flurries changing to rain mixed with snow in the afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming south 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 19 January 2023
